titleStmt.title: SII 8.170: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 170. (A.R. No. 578 of 1902). ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE KITCHEN IN THE SAME TEMPLE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti
śrī . komāṟapaṉmarāṉa tribhuvanacakkiravattikaḷ śrīvirapāṇṭiyatevaṟku yāṇṭu 10 4vatu makaranāyaṟṟu Aparapakṣattup pañcamiyum nāyaṟṟukkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa Attattu
nāḷ Uṭaiyār tirukkāṉapperuṭaiya nāyaṉār koyil Aticaṇṭeccuranāyaṉār tevakaṉmikaḷukku Ivvūr Ālālacuntaraṉtirumaṭattu mutaliyāru
m patiyilāril nakkaṉ nallārāṉa muvāyirattalaikkoliyum Ālālacuntaraṉtirumaṭattu mutaliyār campantapperumāḷukku Innāyaṉār tāṉapa
tikaḷil Uṭaiyāṉ cokkaṉārum campantaṉ Iruvaṟkāḷānāṉa cuntaraśrīrāmanum piḷḷaiyumāka Ivvaṉaivomum piṭipāṭu paṇṇikkuṭutta paricāvatu .
Innāyaṉārkku Iṟaiyili tevatāṉamākap palaperāle Ūrārpakkal perumāḷ kulacekaratevaṟku Āṟāvatu nāḷil Eṅkaḷiṭa vilaikoṇṭu
Anupavittuvarukiṟa kūkaiyūrāṉa kāṉaipperumānallūrkku nāṅkaḷ vilaikoṇṭa cātaṉappaṭiyālu Antarāyattukku
Eppeṟpaṭṭa yūr vilai niccaeItta Ippaṭiyāka na llavum kaṭamaikaḷukku kol kuṭitāṅkiyāṉa patiṉeṭṭuaṭikkolāl nila
maḷantu payirpārttu mutalāṉa nilattil nilam Orumāvukkut taṭitta kak ntaṉa varicai māk kāṇi muntirikai yiṉ kāluṅ ka
ḻittu nikki payir niṉṟa nilattukku māttāl tiruvaṇṇāmalaippiḷḷaiyāl nellu Eḻukalaṉe kuṟuṇiyum Itukkup patiṉāṟu vāciyāka vanta
nellum māṟṟiṭṭu cāvikkup paṟṟiṭṭa nellukkup paṟṟiraṭṭi yiṟuppomākavum tiṉaittū luk keḻvaraku Iṟuṅku ṉallu viḷai
nta nilattukku Oṉṟukāl payirk koḷvārkaḷākavum cittiraik kuṟuvai Āṭikkuṟuvai Aypikai varaku viḷainta nilattukku Oṉṟupāti
payirk koḷvārkaḷākavum Āka Ippaṭiyāl vanta payirkaḷukku muṟppaṭṭa varicaiyāka Ākap payirpārttu mutalāṉa nellum Oṭṭu
ppaṭi paṇam patiṉeṭṭum Āṭṭaivaḻi Iṟuppomākavum Āka Ippaṭikku cantirātittavaṟ celvatākak kallilum cempilum veṭṭikkko
koḷḷap piṭipāṭu paṇṇikkuṭuttom .
Digital edition of SII 8.170 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
